definition.name: NXpeak

symbols.doc: The symbols used in the schema to specify e.g. dimensions of arrays.

definition.doc: Description of peaks, their functional form or measured support.

field.name: label
field.doc: Human-readable identifier to specify which concept/entity the peak represents/identifies.

field.name: peak_model
field.doc: Is the peak described analytically via a functional form or is it empirically via measured/reported intensity/counts as a function of an independent variable.

field.name: position
field.doc: In the case of an empirical description of the peak and its shoulders, this array holds the position values for the independent variable.

field.name: intensity
field.doc: In the case of an empirical description of the peak and its shoulders, this array holds the intensity/count values at each position.

group.doc: In the case of an analytical description holds parameter(s) of the functional form. For example in the case of Gaussians mu, sigma, cut-off values, and background intensity.
